title: BOT PLAYERS ON ARAM GAMES
body: Seriously I see this on nearly every aram game I play now, I just got out of a match where 3 people on my team were clearly bots as they kept walking into the enemy team constantly and wouldn't say a word. There were also 2 other people on the enemy team doing the exact same thing and there janna told me it happened to him last game as well. RIOT DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS

replies.body: I even had one yesterday. They take Ghost and the snowball as their summoner spells, and just run at you and AA. My bro even had like 4 ARAM games in a row with at least 3 bots in them.

This happened to me as well!, the player 'IwillcarryMyTeam' has like 8 bots in aram and i was playing against with is 4 bots and the other 4 was on that player side so i assumed that he could have modded the game or using hacks, also i found out he could easily gain gold during ingame which could be another hack. lastly i checked that player's match history it have seems he played aram twice but with bots again!
